meta.title: RascalAI ‚Äì Your best sales assistant
meta.description: Rascal AI frees sales from routines and preparation so you can focus on winning customer interactions.

hero.title: Assistant for sales, marketing and leadership
hero.subtitle: Rascal AI brings you a new team member who frees up experts' time, increases your team's work productivity, enhances work meaningfulness, strengthens your brand and grows your sales ‚Äì safely, efficiently and productively.

sections.latestArticlesDescription: Stay up to date with AI and automation trends

cta.dueDiligenceDesc: A free 60-minute assessment: where AI brings the fastest and biggest benefits ‚Äì without hype or guesswork.
cta.book30minDesc: We'll show how Rascal AI frees your salespeople to do their best work and takes results to the next level.

implementation.title: Implementation that delivers results immediately
implementation.description: Rascal AI service implementation is not just a technical installation ‚Äì it's a four-workshop process that ensures your team gets full benefit from day one.

workshop1.title: User training ‚Äì speed to start
workshop1.description: We learn together to use Rascal AI in a practical way. Your team immediately gets to grips with daily benefits, which reduces unnecessary learning and makes the first successes visible quickly.

workshop2.title: Distinctive story ‚Äì the core of sales and marketing
workshop2.description: Together we build a clear and distinctive message for your company. When the story is clear, content produced by AI also consistently supports it and makes your communication coherent, credible, and appealing.

workshop3.title: Productivity leap ‚Äì AI for the right tasks
workshop3.description: We determine in which areas Rascal AI best supports your team. This way, artificial intelligence becomes a concrete assistant that frees up sellers' and experts' time for customer interactions ‚Äì and helps create new, lasting routines.

workshop4.title: Data Architecture & Data Management ‚Äì right information, right time
workshop4.description: We find out where information moves and how it relates to sales, marketing, and customer work. We build a clear data architecture and create a foundation for better data management. This way, duplicate work is avoided, and information genuinely becomes useful in decision-making.

implementation.summary: Four workshops, one goal: ensure that Rascal AI makes your work smoother, more efficient, and more productive from the start.

blog.title: Articles
blog.description: Timely insights on sales, marketing and the possibilities of AI
blog.error: Failed to load articles. Please try again later.

intro.p1: Rascal AI is your new teammate who sees the entire sales and marketing field ‚Äì and handles it for you.
intro.p2: Content under control: creates a plan, produces and publishes social posts, blogs and newsletters.
intro.p3: Customer contacts in order: calls, qualifies needs, schedules meetings and answers calls.
intro.p4: Fully automatically: all this happens in your own voice and style ‚Äì so that customer relationships progress and you save time.
intro.p5: Rascal AI does what would otherwise be left undone ‚Äì and ensures you have more time for customer meetings.

social.title: SOCIAL
social.lead: Build trust, brand and sales ‚Äì automatically.
social.body: Rascal AI creates content that resonates with your audience for Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn. It learns your style, voice and goals ‚Äì and produces the content for you.

avatar.title: AVATAR TECHNOLOGY
avatar.lead: Looks like you ‚Äì powered by AI.
avatar.body: Avatar technology creates a digital copy of you that appears in videos and produces content with your face. Realistic, impactful and above all effective.

blog.title: BLOGS & ARTICLES
blog.body: Rascal AI writes articles and blogs precisely for your target audience ‚Äì according to the strategy and content plan. It remembers what's essential and writes like you, at your best.

newsletter.title: NEWSLETTERS
newsletter.body: When an article is ready, Rascal AI summarizes it into an engaging newsletter and sends it automatically to the right audience.

generator.title: CONTENT GENERATOR
generator.body: Need a post, article or campaign messages quickly? Rascal AI creates relevant content on the fly ‚Äì always in your style.

calls.title: CALLS
calls.lead: AI sells and qualifies ‚Äì like a human.
calls.body: Rascal AI calls, discovers needs and books meetings directly in your calendar. It also handles customer service calls ‚Äì humanly and efficiently.

sms.title: TEXT MESSAGES
sms.body: Reach your audience directly on their phone. Rascal AI sends messages, arranges calls and tracks leads ‚Äì without you lifting a finger.

crm.title: CRM INTEGRATIONS
crm.body: Rascal AI connects to your CRM, keeping all customer data and communications automatically up to date.

why.description: Remove routines, free your salespeople for customer interactions and raise results to a new level. Rascal Company was born from one question: What would happen if your salespeople spent 30‚Äì50% more time with customers ‚Äì as soon as next month?

salesMarketing.title: Sales and marketing
salesMarketing.description: Free your salespeople from routines and let them focus on the interactions that generate revenue.

contentProduction.title: Content production
contentProduction.description: AI produces marketing content for various channels, newsletters, blogs and email campaigns.

processOptimization.title: Process optimization
processOptimization.description: Continuously learns from published content and executed actions, improving performance.

team.description: Meet the people behind Rascal AI.

auth.resetSent: Check your email for the password reset link!
auth.invalidLink: This password recovery link is invalid or expired.

meta.title: AI Due Diligence ‚Äì RascalAI
meta.description: A free one-hour assessment: where AI brings the fastest and biggest benefits in sales, marketing, customer service, product development and leadership.

hero.title: AI Due Diligence
hero.subtitle: Free 60-minute assessment: where AI brings the fastest and biggest benefits ‚Äì without hype or guesswork.

whatIs.title: What is it?
whatIs.p: RascalAI's AI Due Diligence is a free one-hour assessment that shows where AI brings the fastest and biggest benefits in your business. It identifies critical areas in sales, marketing, customer service, product development and leadership ‚Äì without hype or guesswork.

problem.title: What problem does it solve?
items: Removes guesswork: where to apply AI first
Unifies scattered experiments into a single action plan
Ensures AI initiatives are tied to KPI/OKR metrics

deliverables.title: What do you get?
items: AI Heatmap: a clear view of where AI brings the most value
Top 10 opportunities: one-pager describing value and impact
Data and risk profile: GDPR, privacy and quality assurance
Training and change model: how the team gets full benefit from AI

process.title: How it's done ‚Äì 5 steps
items: Measure ‚Äì assess current state and data readiness
Prioritize ‚Äì score benefits, risks and feasibility
Plan ‚Äì build a clear action plan

benefits.title: Business benefits
items: Sales: faster deals, higher win rate
Customer service: shorter response times, happier customers
Product development: faster from idea to market

form.title: Fill out the form and book your assessment
form.description: Tell us about your company and goals so we can prepare for the assessment call in the best possible way.

cta.title: Let's start with a free 60-minute assessment
cta.body: Let's make AI a new team member that accelerates growth and streamlines everyday work.

meta.title: Dashboard - Rascal AI

placeholders.name: e.g. sales, customer support
placeholders.targetAudience: B2B decision makers, CFOs at mid-size companies
placeholders.agentPersona: You are Sarah, a friendly sales consultant at TechCorp. You help business owners streamline their operations with our software solutions.
placeholders.toneStyle: Professional yet warm. Use clear, jargon-free language. Keep sentences short and pause naturally for responses.
placeholders.callGoals:
1. Qualify budget and timeline
2. Identify key pain points
3. Determine decision-making process
4. Book demo with qualified leads
placeholders.guidelines: Always confirm understanding before moving on. If prospect asks off-topic questions, acknowledge briefly and redirect. Never interrupt; let them finish speaking completely.
placeholders.greeting: Hi, this is Sarah from TechCorp!
placeholders.purposeIntro: I'm reaching out because you recently downloaded our pricing guide. I wanted to see if you had any questions and share how we've helped similar companies reduce costs by 30%.
placeholders.questions:
1. What's your current process for [specific task]?
   [wait for answer]
2. What challenges are you facing with that approach?
   [wait for answer]
3. If you could wave a magic wand, what would the ideal solution look like?
   [wait for answer]
placeholders.closing: This has been really helpful! Based on what you shared, I think a personalized demo would be valuable. I'll send you a calendar link - does Tuesday or Thursday work better for you?
placeholders.agentNotes: Record: Preferred contact time, current solution name, budget range mentioned, decision timeline, competitor mentions, specific pain points, and any follow-up commitments made.
placeholders.firstSms: SMS message sent to the customer before the call... (max 160 characters)
placeholders.summary:
‚Ä¢ 2‚Äì3 sentence summary in English.
‚Ä¢ What was discovered + agreed next steps.
placeholders.successAssessment:
‚Ä¢ In 2‚Äì3 sentences, assess whether the goals were met.
‚Ä¢ Why it succeeded/failed and what's missing.

examples.agentName: "Emma from Customer Success" or "Alex - Technical Support"
examples.targetAudience: Be specific: "HR managers at 50-500 employee companies" instead of just "HR managers"
examples.agentPersona: "You are Emma, a customer success specialist at CloudCo. You help clients maximize their ROI by identifying optimization opportunities and providing actionable recommendations."
examples.toneStyle: "Conversational and consultative. Mirror the prospect's energy level. Use 'we' language to build partnership. Avoid technical terms unless the prospect uses them first."
examples.callGoals:
"1. Confirm current solution & satisfaction level
2. Identify 2-3 specific challenges
3. Gauge interest in ROI calculator
4. Schedule next touchpoint"
examples.guidelines: "Ask permission before diving into questions. If they're busy, offer to reschedule immediately. Surface objections gently with 'It sounds like...' framing. Always end with a clear next step."
examples.greeting: "Good morning! This is Alex calling from CloudCo." - Keep it natural and friendly.
examples.purposeIntro: "I noticed you attended our webinar last week. I'm following up to see what resonated with you and answer any questions. Is now a good time for a quick chat, maybe 5-7 minutes?"
examples.questions:
1. How are you currently handling customer onboarding?
   [wait for answer]
   ‚Üí If manual: How much time does that take per week?
2. What's the biggest bottleneck in that process?
   [wait for answer]
3. Have you explored automation tools before?
   [wait for answer]
   ‚Üí If yes: What didn't work about them?
examples.closing: "Thanks for your time! I'll email you those resources we discussed plus our ROI calculator. Any final questions before I let you go? Perfect - talk soon!"
examples.agentNotes: "Flag as 'Hot Lead' if budget confirmed + decision timeline under 60 days. Tag with primary use case. Note any technical requirements or integration needs mentioned."
examples.summary: Summarize in 2‚Äì3 sentences: whether they attended [event], key interests/challenges, agreed next steps (time/method).
examples.successAssessment: Assess whether these were achieved: 1) attendance info, 2) interests/challenges, 3) follow-up agreement, 4) time/method of contact. Justify briefly.

aiEnhancement.title: I want to enhance this with AI
aiEnhancement.description: Send the call type to AI enhancement. You'll get back an optimized version that's better tailored to your customers.

benefits.title: Benefits of AI enhancement:
benefits.suggest: Suggest improvements to script and approach

timeout.description: Define how long the session remains active after inactivity.
info: A warning appears 5 minutes before the session ends
All activity (mouse, keyboard, touch) resets the timer
Settings are saved to the browser's localStorage
If you don't set your own timeout, the page default is used
